# Focos App 

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Simple Shiny application that accesses hotspots provided by Queimadas project. The WFS, WMS, TMS and STAC services are accessed. The interactive visualization was done with a leaflet.

Live example: [oldlipe.shinyapps.io/focos/](https://oldlipe.shinyapps.io/focos/)
